website_summaries.verdict: The best all around Xbox headset for clear, dynamic sound during intense gaming.
pros: Embedded subwoofer offers better low-end sounds and music than other options
Overall design is ergonomically shaped to fit most head sizes without causing discomfort
cons: Ear cushions are limited in adjustability
Build quality does not last as long as more expensive models

customer_reviews.title: this is a great headset buy it i love it
customer_reviews.text: this is a great headset buy it i love it. i heard that people have said they get mad because they cant play xbox ad have the lights on at the sam time well u can and i do just go to this linkand buy a portable charger. this headset works great high quality better than turtle beach buy it i got the camo one its so cool
customer_reviews.author: Eric Means

customer_reviews.title: I tried them on my self and they’re comfortable and the sound is great
customer_reviews.text: Got em for my son and he loves it. I tried them on my self and they’re comfortable and the sound is great
customer_reviews.author: Atxeliza

customer_reviews.title: Headset was at a good price and was shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: Headset was at a good price and was shipped quickly. The headset appears to be of good quality, but haven't been used yet, it is a Christmas gift for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: wwjones55

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with the performance of this headset. For less than $30 this purchase was totally worth it so far. Let’s see how long they last. Sound quality is quite good. I only got them to replace the headset that came with my pkay station so I can talk to friends in parties while gaming but now I can actually hear everything in the game which helps a lot. If they last a good amount of time I 10/10 recommend this dirt cheap purchase compared to higher end more expensive headsets
customer_reviews.author: jack fossler

customer_reviews.title: This item was great for the first five months then out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: i am taking a second chance on this item! Bengoo's customer service was five star so let's see what happens. I am very excited to try it again! Since the mic had great quality unlike the other headsets for my daughters Virtual School I would have to say that aspect is also five stars. This item was great for the first five months then out of the blue the mic doesn't work anymore. It wasn't abused just normal use. Before it stopped working it was great. My daughter was even using it with her computer to do her Virtual School assignments because the mic quality was really good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shikes

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, AMAZING customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my 1 star to a 5 star. The first headset didn't work and they sent me a replacement that works perfectly. Great customer service and now I am truly able to enjoy the headset the way it was intended. 4 stars for the actual headset and 1 star for the customer service and quickly replacing the lemon. I would give the actual headset 4 stars because the USB is very short and you are unable to have that lights on and have the aux into the PS4 remote. It works perfect other than not being able to utilize the cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: Don Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good Gaming Headset For Low $$$
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Previous headset was replaced by seller at no cost. This was a good headset that really impressed me with its sound and mic quality until the mic stopped after 9 months. Probably buying a wireless headset to replace it. Looking for warranty information if possible. Also never used the light up feature. If you own a PS4 or Xbox you'll never use the light up which require the old school USB to plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My son said he Needed these. He's happy I listened they're pretty clear no background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Angehl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Ok let me explain, when I first got it I was excited as I could finally talk with my friends. So like 10 minutes in my friends bring up an echo, whenever i muted my mic the echo would disappear meaning! That these headphones have a echo. The reason why it was echoy was because the sound coming out the headphones was so loud that it travelled out the speaker to the close up microphone. Not to mention I could hear everything from the headphones even if I wasn’t even wearing them 1/5 PLEASE DON’T BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Antuan Amirkhanyan

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal customer service
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these headphones; says they are the best he's ever had. Used them for almost a year now and only had 1 small problem with a piece breaking. Bengoo went out of their way (Stephanie!) to thoroughly research what we needed and what they could do. I can't say enough great things about how quickly they responded each time I emailed and they bent over backwards to help us out with a replacement set. Service as good as that isn't very common. So not only do we have an excellent set of headphones, we were also treated courteously and were helped quickly. Thank you Bengoo!
customer_reviews.author: Social Studies

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Update*** the merchant reach out to me within 24-48hrs to replacement product since it was a defect with item I first receive. I receive the replacement item 2 days after they reach out to me. I just got a chance to test the replacement headset and the noise cancellation does work.**** The sound quality is good, durability so far is fine. With the mic down other game players can hear me breathing and I wasn't breathing heavily at all. So the mic has to be left up and ends up being rarely used. I would not recommend this item for frequent gamer that play with others online daily.
customer_reviews.author: K.Huynh

customer_reviews.title: At first the sound was super low even after turning the volume all the way ...
customer_reviews.text: At first the sound was super low even after turning the volume all the way up and I was like eh you get what you pay for I guess but the more I used them the louder and louder they got and now they're almost as good as my Sony gold editions that cost 100$ so I guess I'm pretty happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog broke my pair from 2017
customer_reviews.text: I am back to buy a second pair of these headphones to replace my son's other ones that the dog bit the microphone off of. He had the exact same headphones as these that we purchased in February of 2017. Now we come fr a headphone/earbud problematic family. I feel as if constantly replacing something that has broken overblown out, so it was to my amazement that he had actually obtained the gaming headphones over a year and a half ago. The headphones had such good sound quality he wanted to keep them even though the mic was broken. The were built to last very heavy hard plastic. I have all good things to say about these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Busy buyer

customer_reviews.title: I use this on my PS4 and I love it. Looks great and feels like a well ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my PS4 and I love it. Looks great and feels like a well made product. It plugs directly on to the controller and works. No light, unless you use the usb port so that's more for a PC user. My kid wanted one on her phone and surprisingly the mic works on the Galaxy S7. Now I will have to buy her one.
customer_reviews.author: dbug

customer_reviews.title: A good headset so far
customer_reviews.text: We have had two Bengoo headsets and both are still functioning. If you know kids, then you know that they are extremely hard on everyhting. These headsets have so far been the best we have bought for them. The mic is no flimsy and works well. I think it's a great thing that the microphone does NOT detach. They are also very light and they fit the kids very well (one 11 and one 13). I hope this review helps you to choose. I have bought more expensive headsets and it's just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Good build, just not enough decibels.
customer_reviews.text: Alright, I love the look and feel of these headphones. But, the volume at HALF LEVEL is BARELY audible. For example, I'm playing Red dead right now, and I put it half way up and dialogue is inaudible. Whispers. All the way up and it's midnight (my house is dead silent) and I'm having trouble making out the words. Insane. Why does the wheel scroll down so much when it mutes at just over half way?
customer_reviews.author: Leon Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: They are definitely what they say they are!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a parent of a son who has these I dislike how good they are with the noise reduction 😉😉 my son probably thinks he is just talking to these other people playing but he is actually screaming😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Brendal

customer_reviews.title: Volume is louder in 1 ear
customer_reviews.text: Cancels out EVERYTHING. Sound is louder in one ear versus the other. UPDATE: Customer Service was helpful and reached out to offer a refund or replacement. After nearly 7 months I’ve already replaced and pitched the defective pair. So instead I opted for a refund. They were able to approve at least a $30 gift card in lieu refund due to “ error with Amazon refund system.” Also asked for an updated review. Very helpful despite.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Rose

customer_reviews.title: I hate to do it this way but I don't see other option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for my kid on September 23 2019, he barely uses it and the headset doesn't work correctly anymore, the comes and goes and the mic has some sort of interference noise, I've been trying to contact the seller but I see no way to do it and the website just won't load... Should I assume that this product's lifetime is only a year of light use?
customer_reviews.author: Sean&AnnieWhite

customer_reviews.title: They stand by their warranty-great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Bengo contacted me and made every effort to let me know that they stand by their year warranty and replaced the broken headphones. My son is very happy again and I'd purchase from this company again. ORIGINAL REVIEW: My son loved these until they stopped working after 4 months. He was grounded for 2 out of the 4 months from his xbox so they really didnt get much use. Suddenly when you plug them in the sound quality is super low and you can hardly hear anything.
customer_reviews.author: Maddisen

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price durable, and effective
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for. I’ve had countless expensive headsets such as turtle beach stealth 500p, Xbox HD adapter with headset,etc and they have all broke. This headset is very affordable and great quality for both PS4 and my Xbox one X I just appreciate it’s quilty and tha price and I’m pretty sure you will too
customer_reviews.author: James Creer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son to use while playing fornite. My husband and i also use them as well. They were very soft and comfy to use. No head pressure what so ever. No digging in the ear no squeezing it was awesome plus plus the cord its self is very durabale making it easier to move around and to put up when not using. I def recommend these headphones for someone looking for a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Carters mommy

customer_reviews.title: Braided cable USB Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset has surprisingly good audio quality. Being on the cheaper end compared to other headsets, I thought it would have poor quality but it is just perfect for games. The mic quality is great too, my friends have no complaints with hearing me. The braided cable is a plus because it helps prevent tangling with the cable when it's packed away. The medallion with mute and volume wheel are convenient during use. The only thing I'm not too fond of is the LED lights coming from it because they can be a little harsh at night when the lights are off. Other than that personal preference, it's a solid headset for the price. 7/10
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Brother likes them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a Christmas gift for my brother. He plays a lot of video games. His old headset was the Turtle Beach brand, but that wasn’t in my price range. These were much more affordable, and he says they work very well. The sound quality is good, and they are comfortable too. He also liked the camo print. Overall, I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updates
customer_reviews.text: Update review: the seller followed up with my dissatisfaction. They took care of my concern. My son wanted this for its look. The quality is definitely not the greatest. I have other better brands that last forever. I just found it broken sitting at the corner. My son said that it only worked for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Microphone problems on two pairs
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, but I've had mic issues with both pairs (I sent one back and may have to send the second pair back too). FYI- the lights are ONLY supposed to work if you use these in a computer with the USB plug. They're not supposed to light up using them in a video game controller.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: my son really liked it but I returned it
customer_reviews.text: Update on Bengoo headset, I received the first headset and the microphone quit working, my son really liked it but I returned it. The company stepped up and they are sending us another one no charge. That's customer service, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelation the best feature!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The noise cancelation in these headphones , are so much better compared to my last cheaper ones! I don't even realize how loud In talking because the noise cancelation is so good. Takes me right into the game and clear conversation with fellow gamers. Good product! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this to use with his Xbox-One for Xbox Live. He keeps talking about how great it is. We had a (cheaper) headset before and it broke within 3 minutes. This brand/headset is much sturdier, the ear-cups are more comfortable and it has a great microphone where his friends say he comes through very clear when they are online gaming. There are these super-cool LED lights on the sides of this headset that make his friends jealous! I would recommend this headset to anyone wanting something that is comfortable to wear for hours and has great sound quality. The volume adjustment and mute button one the headset cord is a nice added feature.
customer_reviews.author: McNeill Wells

customer_reviews.title: 1st set broke, BUT they sent a replacement.  Happy kid, Happy Parents!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. They worked well for a little bit and then died. Update 7/31/20: a replacement has arrived for the broken headset. A company that stands behind their product is hard to find right now. Thank you bengoo! My son said the sound quality is much better. So I stand corrected from my previous review and have provided this update.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Michaylo

customer_reviews.title: great for gaming, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my older Xbox One, i did not read the all the information before I bought them. I was able to plug in to my TV audio jack & it gave me sound, you can hear foot steps above,below,in front of or behind you when gaming. I contacted the seller about the mic problem & not working on my Xbox.They responded with in 2 hours and gave me the information to get an adapter to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound went out. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for awhile and then the microphone went out. I got these for my husband for Christmas and about a week ago he could hear other people but people could not hear him. UPDATE: The very nice company that I ordered these from, reached out to me to resolve the issue. Within days the company sent us a new pair of headphones. I GREATLY appreciate the professionalism of Bengoo and their eagerness to resolve the issue. Thank you so much customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again lol
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through headsets like crazy. This one I have bought twice now. The first one made it almost a year. My son loves it. Theses headsets have lasted far longer than any other ones I have bought, and I have bought many from the super expensive Xbox ones to the cheap ones at rite aid and quite a few in between. The only complaint my son has is he can’t figure out how to make it light up. But he doesn’t really care. It looks cool and it holds up well. And the price isn’t bad either:)
customer_reviews.author: Jolynn R.

customer_reviews.title: If you glasses, the ear muffs are too small.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I was bummed because this was my 50th birthday present to myself. However, they fit my 18 year old's non-glass wearing head perfectly, so we traded :-) They were shipped super quick, they're very nice looking, the cord is too short to light them up while playing my PS4, but would probably work great with a PC, or if your PS4 is very close in front of you.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetbrightness

customer_reviews.title: 1000% recommend. Clear. Incredible quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: Partner loves these for use with his xbox one. They help cancel noise, have clear audio, and are a great product for the price. Do not feel or seem cheap at all. Would 10/10 recommend. Have had zero issues with them and he is someone who games like 4 hours a day. Great purchase considering gaming headphones are usually really expensive. Microphone is clear and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Copple

customer_reviews.title: Fun headphones, very sturdy design!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 yrs old. They are a little big on him. They don’t fall. They’re just big sturdy headphones. I like the design and that the cable is really long. He loves them. You have to connect a second cable to have the lights on. But he doesn’t really care for that. Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality- Great service
customer_reviews.text: we were really disapointed in these, they look as though they light up, they don't. and we've had them 30 days and the part that plugs into the device is already bent and its to late to return/exchange. terrible product for the price. Updated: Company reached out and sent a replacement headset at no cost. My son was so glad, it's been a couple weeks and the seem to be holding up better. Great service!
customer_reviews.author: Intentional motherhood

customer_reviews.title: Cheap got everything
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of headset I wanted this for my gaming worked brilliantly plus it has a noise cancellation that adda to its feature I looked it for my local store and no headset of this quality was at this price so an excellent buy for me
customer_reviews.author: izan

customer_reviews.title: For looks, get it. For functionality, get something else.
customer_reviews.text: The headset aesthetics are sooooo cool, but connectivity issues are equally present. It takes one or two replug-ins before I can hear the audio, the quality of which is heavily underwhelming. For looks, get it. For functionality, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Costa

customer_reviews.title: Where's my headset?
customer_reviews.text: These look really cool, work well. The music vol seems to be quite louder then chat volume and I can't seem to get that fixed by changing settings in game but not bad enough to be problematic, still can be an annoyance at times. Overall recommended headset for sure, just make sure you remember where you put it...it can blend in easily (HAHAHAH)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would also make the music he listens to sound better. It didn't
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandson who seems to eat them at an alarming pace. I thought it would also make the music he listens to sound better. It didn't, it still sounds like garbage, all cursing, etc. Other than that, they do work well, you will not be disappointed unless you listen to rap music, then it won't matter.
customer_reviews.author: kevin j conron

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed how good it felt on my head, I wear glasses and usually get irritated by the headsets when I'm wearing them. But these did not bother me at all. They were also great for realistic game in which we need surround hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Samaritana Tainsh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband, he said they are a little quieter than he’d like but they work. He said they are very comfortable as well and that they get the job done. He uses them for a PS4 to play games & chat with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones if the budget is tight
customer_reviews.text: I love how this headphone sounded right off the box. The bass is OK for what they cost. It isn't to cheap and isn't the best of course... just enough. They don't really cancel sound unless you put the volume all the way up. The sound quality is actually pretty crisp and there isn't a echo that you would find in super cheap headphones. This is the best way you can go for 30 dollars. The mic is good, I like how it has the switch to turn it on and off. And the volume adjuster to lower the volume without moving anything on the tv or pc is a nice feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: José Santana

customer_reviews.title: updated- Mic stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: I contacted customer service. They stand by their product and immediately replaced the headset. My son reports that headset is working great. I appreciate the follow up by the company. Original post: My son loved this headset. He saved up money for a few months and was so excited to purchase them. When the headset worked, it worked great. But for the mic to go out after only 5 months made me score this so low. I typically don't write reviews, but these should have lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Elic

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive headset!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset for my son. He plays different games on XBOX one S and he says the sound and microphone are AWESOME! From a parents' perspective, they are an inexpensive set that allows him to talk to his friends, immerse himself in game and drown out his annoying sisters (lol). Well worth the money for him
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son bought this with some saved money he had. It arrived on time and is now an addition to his head basically. Jokes aside, it works really well. He has clear connection, clear audio and seems to be a great buy. The ear pads on the head phones are very soft but sturdy. Great quality and surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset for my son and he loves it for gaming. The sound quality is great and the cord is flexible so that it is not easily damaged. No complaints about the microphone from those listening either. The thing about headphones and kids of any age is how easily they break from everyday use. My son broke his and I bought him a new one. I just bought a pair for my nephew and his broke. It's a physical break so not sound related. I have been through many different brands of headphones with my son and have yet to find a pair that doesn't snap and break.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good headphone option, then this is it. Sound quality is great and a little (very minor) discomfort during extended wear. Overall, great choice. You do need a USB plugin to get the lights to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great price, excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works very well on my PC and across my consoles as well (XBOX ONE and PS4) would buy again and is just as good if not better than the two Turtle beach sets I wasted more money on for the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cosimo J Bressi Jr

customer_reviews.title: The ear pads are small and not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for kids, but not recommended for adults. Right off the bat the ear pads are too small and the material isn’t the most comfortable. The decibel level is lower than my previous studio Sennheiser headphones. The lights need to plug into a usb to work. I’m playing on PS4 so I’d have to use an external battery with USB port for them to work because the chord is too small to reach the ps4. Other than that, the plastic is sturdy and durable. Only real complaint is the size and comfort of the over the ear pads.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Hepworth

customer_reviews.title: Joke of a company
customer_reviews.text: The headset worked for awhile then we started having intermittent issues and about a month later it stopped working. Since it was less than a year old we reached out about the warranty with no respose to any of our attempts. We realize that things happen but customer services a joke as was the warranty
customer_reviews.author: Odin45

customer_reviews.title: Happy kid
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. The cord is extra long, so he has plenty of room to jump up and down, or walk a few steps away for snacks. The lights are subtle, but a nice touch. It seems well made, and the braided cord appears tough enough to survive some abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable headset I’ve ever owned. The sound quality is amazing and I highly recommend them for the total gaming experience! The only thing I didn’t know is that it needs a 3.5mm jack adapter to fit to an Xbox controller. Or you need a controller that already has one. I didn’t have one so needed to make an additional purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Davis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: They’re almost great. They are comfortable with a good cable and a reasonable price however they’re so quiet . If my house isn’t completely silent I might as well take them off and have the audio pushed through the speakers. I wouldn’t buy if you’re buying to be able to hear footsteps or anything along those lines.
customer_reviews.author: James Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pay for insurance wasted your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset and paid for insurance not sure how much I paid for it but when the headset stopped working in few months. Can’t contact nobody to replace it including Amazon customer service. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Huyen Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My in laws bought these for my 11 yr old son to go with a gaming chair. He loves them! Work great and he loves the feel of the mic so he can play online with his friends. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian living in New York

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old LOVES this headset. He won’t shut up about it. It’s very comfortable to wear, the audio is very clear. His friends say his voice sounds smooth, over the mic. The only downside is that the audio, doesn’t go to high. But I’m glad to know, my son’s hearing won’t be affected. Also, I wish the usb cord was longer. My son likes the light up option. Shipping was on time and packaging was efficient. Overall I would recommend this headset. (My son uses it on the X-Box One)
customer_reviews.author: Betz

customer_reviews.title: MANUAL & FEATURES??
customer_reviews.text: Product came today..seems to work okay and will update with use ..BUT right out of the box..BARELY English ESPECIALLY with components in manual..the LIGHT UP FEATURE..NOT WORKING AT ALL?? .Cant go to the manual...no ENGLISH TO TROUBLESHOOT or really to understand....so...I guess ..you get what you pay for???? Wont promote...
customer_reviews.author: Free

customer_reviews.title: Dont pull the cords
customer_reviews.text: This is what i will say about this headset. The quality is actually not that bad noise cancelling is kinda meh in the side of things. 3d sound is actually in this bad boy. I personally love this headset, but there r some downsides. The cords themselves tangle pretty badly. So whatever you do take care of them and down let it tangle. I myself caused my own headset to break because i was trying to fix the tangle and the cord pulled out from the sound control spot (where u mute ur mic and unmute) so its not bad in my opinion. Hope this helps. P.S. Dont pull on the cords... Dont. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: TylerA

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - From disappointment to pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Was recently contacted by this company and offered a full refund for the device I was provided. While my experience was initially disappointment, I was pleased with their ability to make it right. Received this item on October 8, 2018 and by December 29, 2018 it was not functioning with any of our Xbox One controllers - wired or wireless. It was great for the price in the beginning, but this device has no durability.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: No active noise cancelling, but the cufs fit over your ears and do a decent job filtering the noise out once you have a game or music on. Sound quality is surprisingly excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Please with the headphones
customer_reviews.text: I originally had give this headphone an ok review because of how uncomfortable it was for my son. Shortly after almost a year after I purchased the headset they replaced the headphones and we are very pleased with the replacement. Thank you so much for caring so much on how your customers feel about your products.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa A.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My kids went over the top when they got these. They absolutely love them. The bonus for me is we are not going through batteries like crazy when they use them. I would highly recommend, great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update !
customer_reviews.text: Update: manufacture reached out to replace both broken mic’s. Received the replacements within two days. Hoping these ones will last. Will update again. Thank you. Do not buy! I bought two, these things do not last!! One stopped working within two weeks, so I exchanged it. A month later the other stopped working, and now the replacement doesn’t work. We’re now left with zero headsets and out the money too!! I would give zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mic broke but still great!!
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift for my 12 y/o brother & he had them for like a month & the mic broke but idk it might’ve been his fault since he’s clumsy. the mic didn’t last very but other than that, they’re nice headphones. However, the company bengoo did fix the problem for me so I’d recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arely

customer_reviews.title: Mic broke
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these but the mic stopped working after a couple of months so bummed because the color and the noise blocking was awesome : I almost ordered another pair but then didn’t because of the mic
customer_reviews.author: Domm721

customer_reviews.title: Afforable quality headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 9 year old for his birthday. In 6 months they have been durable and had no problems. The audio sounds great. For a cheap headset, I couldn't ask for more. If you're looking for an entry level headset, this product is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Happy gamer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 8 year old sons birthday. He loves the design and says they are very comfortable and have good sound for gaming purposes. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Bought tgese for my son. He uses them for gaming, his tablet and doing his homework to cancel noise. They are adjustable for fit to size needed and super comfortable. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jarman

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this...
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to get this for my Xbox One. When I received it, I plugged in into my controller—limited sound, no light. Tried it with the adapter—limited sound, no light. Total waste of money. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie E.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected for video games, good price
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé says they work great for video games, took us a while to figure out how the LED lights work but turns out we needed to charge the headset using the USB into the PlayStation and they turned on right away. I originally ordered the yellow head set but received the camouflage ones instead but he didn’t care either way since they work well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We bought this headset for our son so he could ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this headset for our son so he could play his xbox and such. He not only uses it for gaming but also for listening to music and talking on the phone. He loves this headset because of the multiple uses, and the fact that they look similar to the headphones he uses when he flies.
customer_reviews.author: D. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Forgivable design shortfall for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool looking headset. The USB attachment doesn't have much use for us since we sit far from a USB outlet and its only purpose is to light up the LEDs. The mic arm seems unnecessarily short, it could easily be an inch or two longer. That said, it picked up my voice fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these for both movie watching and gaming
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter uses these to play Fortnite and Minecraft - they are super comfortable and the sound quality is great. We try to keep iPad usage to 1 hour at a time and there a never complaints that the over ear head phones are uncomfortable. A few thins she really likes: the volume control, the mic on/off switch, and the LED lights (as well as the camo coloring. Overall I have no complaints about these and would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget the splitter!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these to game with. He says he can still hear some backgroynd noise. The issue we had is that it was hard to find a splitter with one female end and two males ends. Make sure you have that before you buy or you won't be able to use it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. They’re really comfortable and are well made. Very good coloring too. Great sound quality. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use on pc
customer_reviews.text: Says you can use on a pc.... however 3 of us... all have been gaming for a very long time and we have realized that you can’t use the mic on a pc... so no point of this headset for a pc.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift for my son and he loves them. He loves them because they block out all noise. Honestly, you can’t hear anything with these things on. I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: johnny cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a year so far with a 9 year old male heavy gamer
customer_reviews.text: It lasts about a year we have bought 2 so far but this is with a 9 year old who is not friendly to it and almost every day gaming involved. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Electrical Fluke

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a relatively cheap headset so I wouldn't have to keep using my in-ear monitors I use for playing music in my band. I found this, and thought it looked good enough to buy. When I opened it and tried it out, I was surprised by the quality and comfortable fit of this headset. The microphone also picks up my voice well. Overall, if your looking at getting a headset without spending a lot of money, this would be a good buy for you.
customer_reviews.author: David Durrant

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for my boyfriend's brother, he's always playing on his PS4 **cough** footnote **cough**. He seems to enjoy it overall though, I don't know how well they work, but he's been using them for two months, so I definitely recommend it as a good option for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana HullTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We use the headset mainly for gaming and sometimes to watch videos on the tv without playing the sound. We like the many options of colors especially the camouflage. We like that the headset fits children and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Volstad

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get to work with Xbox 1
customer_reviews.text: These look super cool but we are unable to get it to work with our new Xbox 1. Very disappointed 10 year old and of course outside of the return window :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT! DO NOT! BUY THIS. This is my second purchase from this company I bought the blue headset and this camo one. BOTH DO NOT WORK! I plug it in, it sounds fine, every 5 minutes the headset stops working and I need to plug it back in and out. One day, I plugged it in and out because it stopped working, and it never reconnected, so i bought the camo one. Within one hour the same thing happened, the wire didn't connect!!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS AT ALL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very solid headphones. The matte material is excellent and very smooth. These saved me very much I was in much need of a gaming headset. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Clayda Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming head set.
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this head set and the sound is clear and great. It also arrived before the estimated shipping time😀 I would give more than 5 stars for this head set if I could. I definitely recommend this product for your gaming kidos ❤.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong a year later
customer_reviews.text: My son is still using these a year after we bought them. He is NOT very gentle with things and these have taken the beatings and are still working great. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sally O'Mally

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the money. Others hear the sound from around the ears but it may be my son has the volume too high. Good quality and appears to have good craftsmanship. Would recommend for a starting set of phones and mic.
customer_reviews.author: MD542

customer_reviews.title: So good and inexpensive, I bought a second set
customer_reviews.text: They work good and sound as good as the much, much more expensive headphones I had til my son broke them. I bought the first set for my son, but they sounded so good, and were inexpensive enough that I bought a second pair for myself. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Best Decision
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones in general. Noice cancellation is an understatement. When I first got them I had to take them off to hear someone was knocking at my door. Easily adjustable, don't need to go into the audio setting to turn down or up the voice. And if I don't wanna talk I can easily flip the switch to cut the mic, and the LED light are just as bright in the photos, maybe even brighter. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We love this headset! Both our boys have them and we have even given them as gifts for their friends. Can’t find a better set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J Yenny

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: My son spent his Christmas Amazon gift certificate on these. He had his eye on this pair for a while. We caught them on sale and he absolutely loves them! The sound and noise cancellation is awesome! The only thing he was a little disappointed in (but was not a game changer) was that the USB must be connected for the LED lights to come on. So the lights come on while he has it plugged into his computer but the headset port for the PS4 controller doesn't light the LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: msgordon

customer_reviews.title: Yess worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband and he loves it . Especially when he can’t hear me when I ask him to throw the trash or watch the kids lmao. So yes it works! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Blanchie

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Overall good headset. The cord is just too short for the light effects to work and must sit next to Xbox to use but the lights aren’t a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Milton E. Amoroso

customer_reviews.title: 5 out 5
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I recommend it not only because it has a good price but it also arrived a lot sooner than expected. Besides it works perfect with the PS4. Very good product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yila

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son to use for gaming with his friends. No issues with connection. He has an xbox one with a new controller, so no need for an extra adapter. It also works great on the computer for his elearning classes when teachers do group meetings. He can hear and talk without having any distracting background noises.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about ordering a headset on amazon, but this one has been the best. It can connect to a controller, a computer, a phone.. whatever! Had it for a year and have had no problems with it what so ever! Great -adjustable- sound quality and comfy for your ears!
customer_reviews.author: Pack912

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea.. my son loves it... only issue I have was the LED lights have to be powered separately, which would be a hassle to me.
customer_reviews.author: Benji S.

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson with his money. He is 11.5. He loves it. He was originally ging to buy another item, but I researched it and we decided on this one. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Frank

product_meta.title: BENGOO Stereo Gaming Headset for PS4, PC, Xbox One Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones Mic, LED Light, Bass Surround, Soft Memory Earmuffs for Laptop Mac Nintendo Gamecube –Camouflage
product_meta.description:
Advantage:
1.【Comfortable feeling】High grade wearable TPE, soft texture, delicate and comfortable touch,it has an elegant appearance.
2.【Environmental friendly material】Earmuffs used with the new second-generation skin-friendly material, reduce heat sweat, more suitable for long wear.
3.【Easy install】Plug and play, 3.5mm plugs for mic and headset + USB plug for lights , more fully guarantee the stability of the sound.
4.【LED LIGHT】Highlight the game atmosphere (USB interface only for power supply to LED lights).
5.【HIGH COMPATIBILITY】Work with 32-bit and 64-bit Win 7/Win8/Win8.1/Win 10/XP.



How to use it on PS4? 
1. Please test it with your cellphone before apply the headset on your PS4, to make sure it works well. 
2. Insert the headset with 3.5mm jack plug into the Gamepad
3. Then long press the PS4 button to enter the System Settings
4. There is a choice "PERIPHERAL MACHINES", choose it and then choose "ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES", next choose "Output to the headphones", then change it to "All audio"



Notes:
1.Extra Microsoft adapter (Not Included) is needed when connect with old version Xbox One controller.
2.1-to-2 3.5mm jack splitter cable (Not Included) is needed when you connect with PC if you want to use headphone and microphone at the same time.
3.The USB interface is only used for power supply to LED light to highlight the atmosphere of the game.



Troubleshooting Methods:
【Sound is too small or no sound】
1.Ensure that your audio devices work properly and sound switch has been turned on.
2.Turn up the sound volume level, Ensure connecting the plug of headset to audio source correctly.



Package Contents:
1 x BENGOO G9000 Gaming Headset-Camouflage
1 x Operating Instruction
feature_bullets: 1.【MULTI-PLATFORM COMPATIBLE】Support PlayStation 4, New Xbox One, PC, Nintendo 3DS, Laptop, PSP, Tablet, iPad, Computer, Mobile Phone. Please note you need an extra Microsoft Adapter (Not Included) when connect with an old version Xbox One controller.

2.【SURROUNDING STEREO SUBWOOFER】Clear sound operating strong brass, splendid ambient noise isolation and high precision 40mm magnetic neodymium driver acoustic positioning precision bring you vivid sound field, sound clarity, shock feeling sound.

3.【NOISE ISOLATING MICROPHONE】Onmi-directional microphone transmits high quality communication with its premium noise cancelling feature, which enables you conveniently adjust angle of the microphone and deliver or receive messages while you are in a game.

4.【HUMANIZED DESIGN】Braided USB cable with rotary volume controller and key microphone mute effectively prevents cable from twining.Skin friendly leather material for a longer period of wearing. Superior comfortable over-ear pads reduce hearing impairment and heat sweat.Glaring LED lights desigend on the earcups to highlight game atmosphere.

5.【IMMERSIVE SOUND EXPERIENCE】Angled and highly precise 50mm magnetic neodymium driver bring you vivid sound field, sound clarity, sound shock feeling, capable of various games like Halo 5 Guardians, Metal Gear Solid, Call of Duty, Star Wars Battlefront, Overwatch, World of Warcraft Legion, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,599 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
